How to set custom bitrates on firmware 1.7.17 in autoexec.ash. See the bitrate_mod directory for an example.

To set a custom bitrate for a resolution do:
writew [address] [bitrate]

ex:
writew 0xA0659A96 0x42AC
makes 3840x2160 30p high quality setting encode at 90mbs

bitrates (you can pick values in between or above these for fine tuning):
0x4190 18mbs
0x41F0 30mbs
0x4210 36mbs
0x4220 40mbs
0x4234 45mbs
0x4270 60mbs
0x4284 70mbs
0x4298 80mbs
0x42AC 90mbs
0x42C8 100mbs
0x42D4 110mbs
0x42E8 120mbs
0x42FC 130mbs
0x4306 140mbs
0x4310 150mbs
0x431A 160mbs

(120mbs works if your card is fast enough, the camera crashes if 150mbs is used 
for more than like 3 seconds. If you want to properly test if your card can 
handle a bitrate you need to test for more than a few minutes preferably 
recording lots of motion. If you get a slow sd card error it means your sd card 
is too slow and that the camera stopped recording for a few seconds in order to 
catch up)


addresses for high quality bitrate (+0x10 = medium, +0x20 = low):

NTSC:
0xA0659A96 3840x2160 30P 16:9
0xA0659AC6 3840x2160 24P 16:9
0xA0659AF6 3840x2160 24P 16:9 super
0xA0659B26 2976x2976 30P 1:1
0xA0659B56 2688x2688 30P 1:1
0xA0659B86 2704x1520 60P 16:9
0xA0659BB6 2704x1520 30P 16:9
0xA0659BE6 2704x1520 48P 16:9
0xA0659C16 2704x1520 24P 16:9
0xA0659C46 2704x1520 30P 16:9 super
0xA0659C76 2704x2032 30P 4:3
0xA0659CA6 2560x1920 30P 4:3
0xA0659CD6 2560x1440 60P 16:9
0xA0659D06 2560x1440 30P 16:9
0xA0659D36 HDR 2560x1440 30P 16:9
0xA0659D66 2304x1296 30P 16:9
0xA0659D96 1920x1440 60P 4:3
0xA0659DC6 1920x1440 30P 4:3
0xA0659DF6 1920x1440 48P 4:3
0xA0659E26 1920x1440 24P 4:3
0xA0659E56 1920x1080 60P 16:9
0xA0659E86 1920x1080 60P 16:9 super
0xA0659EB6 1920x1080 45P 16:9
0xA0659EE6 1920x1080 40P 16:9
0xA0659F16 1920x1080 30P 16:9
0xA0659F46 1920x1080 30P 16:9 super
0xA0659F76 HDR 1920x1080 30P 16:9
0xA0659FA6 1920x1080 60I 16:9
0xA0659FD6 1440x1080 60P 16:9
0xA065A006 1440x1080 30P 16:9
0xA065A036 1440x1080 60I 16:9
0xA065A066 1600x1200 60P 4:3
0xA065A096 1600x1200 30P 4:3
0xA065A0C6 1440x1080 30P 4:3
0xA065A0F6 1600x900 30P 16:9
0xA065A126 1280x720 60P 16:9
0xA065A156 1280x720 60P 16:9 super
0xA065A186 1280x720 30P 16:9
0xA065A1B6 848x480 60P 16:9
0xA065A1E6 848x480 30P 16:9
0xA065A216 848x480 30P 16:9 super
0xA065A246 848x480 60P 16:9 super
0xA065A276 720x480 60P 16:9
0xA065A2A6 720x480 30P 4:3
0xA065A2D6 1280x960 60P 4:3
0xA065A306 1280x960 30P 4:3
0xA065A336 960x540 30P 16:9
0xA065A366 640x360 30P 16:9
0xA065A396 640x480 60P 4:3
0xA065A3C6 640x480 30P 4:3
0xA065A3F6 432x240 60P 16:9
0xA065A426 432x240 30P 16:9
0xA065A456 320x240 30P 4:3
0xA065A486 352x240 30P 4:3
0xA065A4B6 2560x1440 50P 16:9
0xA065A4E6 1920x1080 48P 16:9
0xA065A516 1920x1080 24P 16:9
0xA065A546 1920x1080 15P 16:9
0xA065A576 1600x1200 48P 4:3
0xA065A5A6 1600x1200 24P 4:3
0xA065A5D6 1280x960 48P 4:3
0xA065A606 1280x960 24P 4:3
0xA065A636 1280x720 48P 16:9
0xA065A666 1280x720 24P 16:9
0xA065A696 848x480 48P 16:9
0xA065A6C6 848x480 24P 16:9
0xA065A6F6 640x480 48P 4:3
0xA065A726 640x480 24P 4:3
0xA065A756 Precise
0xA065A786 1920x1080 120P 16:9
0xA065A7B6 1920x1080 120P 16:9 super
0xA065A7E6 1920x1080 100P 16:9
0xA065A816 1280x720 240P 16:9
0xA065A846 1280x720 200P 16:9
0xA065A876 1280x720 120P 16:9
0xA065A8A6 1280x720 120P 16:9 super
0xA065A8D6 848x480 240P 16:9
0xA065A906 848x480 120P 16:9
0xA065A936 848x480 90P 16:9 super
0xA065A966 848x480 120P 16:9 super
0xA065A996 640x480 240P 4:3
0xA065A9C6 640x480 120P 4:3
0xA065A9F6 432x240 240P 16:9
0xA065AA26 432x240 120P 16:9
0xA065AA56 320x240 120P 4:3
0xA065AA86 1280x960 120P 4:3
0xA065AAB6 1920x1080 90P 16:9 super

0xA065A906 848x480 100P 16:9
0xA065A936 848x480 90P 16:9 super
0xA065A966 848x480 100P 16:9 super
0xA065A996 640x480 200P 4:3
0xA065A9C6 640x480 100P 4:3
0xA065A9F6 432x240 200P 16:9
0xA065AA26 432x240 100P 16:9
0xA065AA56 320x240 100P 16:9
0xA065AA86 1280x960 100P 4:3
0xA065AAB6 1920x1080 90P 16:9 super


The resolution/bitrate table is located in /dev/mtdblock1 at position 
0x00559A90. This entire partition gets loaded into memory at boot at offset 
0xA0100000.
